CustomDataPermissionResolver - Class in com.stormpath.shiro.realm
A CustomDataPermissionResolver accesses a specific named field value of a CustomData resource that contains a Set&lt;String&gt; of Shiro permission Strings.
CustomDataPermissionResolver() - Constructor for class com.stormpath.shiro.realm.CustomDataPermissionResolver
Creates a new instance, using the default customDataFieldName of apacheShiroPermissions and a default WildcardPermissionResolver.
CustomDataPermissionsEditor - Class in com.stormpath.shiro.authz
A CustomDataPermissionsEditor can read or modify a collection of Shiro permission Strings stored in a CustomData resource.
CustomDataPermissionsEditor(CustomData) - Constructor for class com.stormpath.shiro.authz.CustomDataPermissionsEditor
Creates a new CustomDataPermissionsEditor that will delegate to the specified CustomData instance.

ShiroIniConfigLoader - Class in com.stormpath.shiro.servlet.config
Extends ConfigLoader in order to change the default config factory to AppendingConfigFactory and include additional properties from a shiro.ini into the Config.

NOTE: if the servlet init parameter 'stormpathConfigFactoryClass' is already set this class functions like it's parent.

StormpathShiroPassiveLoginFilter - Class in com.stormpath.shiro.servlet.filter
